titleStmt.title: The true account of the proceedings at the sessions, holden at the sessions-house in the Old-Bayly: for the city of London, county of Middlesex, and goal-delivery of Newgate Which began on the 24th of this instant Feb. and ended on the 25th of the said instant. Containing the tryals of several notorious murtherers, fellons, and burglarers, but especially of George Pie, for killing the butcher in Hungerford-Market. Together, with the names of such as were condemned, the number of those burnt in the hand, to be transported, and whip'd: with many other passages that happened during this remarkable session.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for T: Benskin, in St. Brides-Church Yard,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
